name: Airport Run
description:
You have arrived the airport ,and the only chance you have to make your flight is to grab your ticket and RUN, RUN, RUN!

You will need to be fast and crafty if you want to defeat your fellow passengers and catch your flight! In Airport Run you can access lots of features that include power-ups, daily challenges and social sharing. Download Airport Run and experience the ultimate rush towards your flight!

Features:
• Social sharing
• Access multiple power-ups
• Purchase tickets
• Great graphics
• Leader board
